title: muruga un
sahitya:
murugA en tirumunboru murai sholliDa vandEnE karuNAnidhiyE anbAi kAdinilErppAyE tiru


anupallavi

  varugAdal shei kuramen piDi maruvum punitA paraman tarugAdalin kumarA uyar taNikAcalam amarnda tiru


caraNam    aruLAl nI shirai nIkkiya ayanAr sheidiDu pazhi kEL virai shEr unadAL karudA uLamaLittAnen sheigEn 
perumA idu tAnO uyar piraman puri tozhilAgum parivAi idu kaLaivAi inip-pAdam ninai manamaruLE
